column1: '''''Oiolossë''''' was one of the names of [[Taniquetil]].<ref name=SIndex/>
''Oiolossë'' (also spelled ''Oiolosse'')<ref name=PE17/> is [[Quenya]] and means "Ever-snow-white"<ref name=SIndex>{{S
column3: 17}}, p. 26</ref>, or "Everlasting snow"<ref name=Ety379/>. The name seems to consist of ''[[oio]]'' "ever" (cf. root [[OY

column1: In [[Eriol]]'s [[Old English]] translations, Oiolossë is referred to as ''Sinsnáw, Sinsnǽwen'' "Ever-snow".<ref>{{SM
The [[Sindarin]] equivalent of ''Oiolossë'' was '''''[[Amon Uilos]]'''''.<ref name=SIndex/><ref name=PE17/>
